name: Foode - Food Delivery Mobile App UI Kit
description:
Free design samples and previews for personal use only. Get access to premium, high quality designs, and commercial use by supporting me on the link below ðŸ‘‡


--------------------------------------------------------


Foode is a Premium and High-Quality Food Delivery Mobile App UI Kit with 112 Screens which is highly customizable. Designs are available in Figma, Sketch, Adobe XD, and Invision. In addition, the design is also equipped with a version of Light & Dark Mode.


Foode is designed in a trendy and modern way, with all layers well organized. Foode is equipped with a large design system with 500+ components.


In addition, the application design especially figma has been designed with fully auto layout, so it is very adaptive if you want to delete or add some parts. If you are not familiar with auto layout, you can turn it off by right-clicking the layer, and selecting remove auto layout.


The design is available in my:

UI8 | Gumroad


Features:

  • 110+ Screens
  • Compatibility: Figma, Sketch, Adobe XD, Invision Studio
  • Light & Dark Mode
  • Big Design System & 500+ Components
  • Fully Auto Layout
  • Fully Customizable
  • Well Organized Layers System
  • Unique, Stylish & Modern
  • Used Google Free Fonts
  • Used Grid System


Files included:

  • Figma
  • Sketch
  • Adobe XD
  • Invision Studio


Be sure to check out the preview and let us know your thoughts in the comments section below.
